faq.q1: 1. How can I open an account at FairBank?
faq.a1: It's very simple! You can open an account by visiting <1>fairbank.com/signup</1> and submitting an online application.
faq.q2: 2. Who can open an account at FairBank?
faq.a2: Every client at FairBank must be a Canadian resident and over 18 years old.
faq.q3: 3. Do direct deposits have a hold period?
faq.a3: No, your funds are available as soon as they are deposited.
faq.q4: 4. My account is locked. What should I do to regain access?
faq.a4: To unlock your account, please contact FairBank's Customer Service team at 1-800-123-4567 or via email at contact@fairbank.com
faq.q5: 5. What types of products does FairBank offer?
faq.a5: We offer three types of accounts: Regular, Premium, Ultimate, each with unique benefits. With your FairBank accounts, you can make bill payments, fund transfers, and much more!
faq.q6: 6. How can I find my account number?
faq.a6: Log in to the FairBank portal, and from the dashboard, you will see your unique nine-digit account number.
faq.q7: 7. How is the USD exchange rate calculated at FairBank?
faq.a7: Exchange rates fluctuate constantly, but you can access our live USD exchange rate by logging into your account. We update our exchange rates every 15 minutes.
faq.q8: 8. Can I use FairBank's services if I live outside of Canada?
faq.a8: You can continue to access your current account while traveling outside of Canada. However, all FairBank account holders must be Canadian residents to maintain their accounts.
faq.q9: 9. Where can I use my FairBank card?
faq.a9: You can use your card anywhere Visa cards are accepted, both in Canada and abroad.
faq.q10: 10. Where can I find my tax slips?
faq.a10: Once you have logged in, navigate to the 'My Accounts' tab to download your transaction history.

a1.p2: By entering the amount in $CAD to convert, the Convert button will make the exchange at the immediate market rate, and your foreign currency balance will be updated.

help.q2: 2. How to change my personal information?
help.a2: By pressing on 'Settings' in the Dashboard and 'Account', you can enter your new password or request an email change.

a3.p1: In the account overview, by pressing the 'Request' button and entering another Fairbank client's information with the desired amount, you will send a request to them.
a3.p2: When they accept your request, the funds will be deposited into your account within minutes of acceptance.

help.a4: No, our current system does not allow foreign currency transactions between accounts. Only $CAD transactions are allowed at the moment.
help.q5: 5. How to close my Fairbank account?

a5.p1: By pressing on 'Settings' in the Dashboard and 'Security', you will find the account closure request button.
a5.p2: A Fairbank employee will review and process your account closure as soon as possible.

help.q6: 6. How to download my transaction history?
help.a6: In the account overview, a green button is present on the right side of the graph which will launch a download of your transaction history in Excel format.
help.q7: 7. How to change the appearance of the application?
help.a7: By pressing on 'Settings' in the Dashboard and 'Appearance', you will find options for fonts, dark or light mode, as well as color preference options.
